description.en:
COVID TOKEN is unique token, which provides help to African people about Coronavirus.

There is a 10% fee for each purchase on sale and transfer.
What is included in the 10% Fee price is as follows;
1% to the wallet of disinfectant, mask, food and beverage aid to Africa.
4% to Pool wallet
5% Covid Token holders are distributed to the all wallets, investors are increasing their number of CovidTokens day by day
